pullRequest.title: Issue #1405: Implemented tests for PermissionController
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR is related to issue #1405 and contains tests implementation for PermissionController

nodes.bodyText: warning: Generating equals/hashCode implementation but without a call to superclass, even though this class does not extend java.lang.Object. If this is intentional, add '@EqualsAndHashCode(callSuper=false)' to your type. @EqualsAndHashCode
Could you please fix this test according to your another PR ?
